jobInfo.postDescription: 工作职责：- Deliver projects as planned and with quality to help users to achieve business objectives. - Participate in Java/C++ program development, test plan/cases preparation and execution. - Maintain a good working relationship with relevant stakeholders such as users and IT partners. - Solve the technical problem in project development efficiently. - Prepare project related documentation and ensure compliance and audit policies strictly followed.任职资格：What you will need to succeed in the role: - At least 3 years’ IT development working experience. - Familiar with Java and micro service development. - Know C++ and can do C++ development. - Unix & Linux, hands on experience of Script writing ( Shell Script). - Good Knowledge of PL SQL and Oracle. - Strong problem solving skills . - Solid skill on DevOps processes and Agile methodologies, CI/CD tools such as Confluence, Jira, Jenkins, Git. - Effective communication skills in written/oral English. What additional skills will be good to have? - Understanding of Product Control, Finance and/or Regulatory processes and workflow is a plus. - Experience on Repo is a plus. - Could relative experience.
jobInfo.address: 广州天河区天河区壬丰大厦

brandComInfo.introduce:
凯捷（CAPGEMINI）是全球领先的企业合作伙伴，利用技术的力量改造和管理企业业务。其宗旨是通过技术释放人类能量，创造一个包容和可持续的未来。凯捷是一个负责任的多元化组织，在50余个国家拥有超过34万名团队成员。自1997年进入中国市场以来，始终以人才为核心，扎根并服务于中国市场，近10年来业务持续飞速增长。
凭借其55年的悠久历史和深厚的行业专业知识，在快速发展的云、数据、人工智能、互联连接、软件、数字工程和平台的创新世界推动下，凯捷深受客户信任，能够满足客户从战略、设计到运营的全方位业务需求。凯捷将持续提供给大家一个充分施展才华，有机会成功、成长的自由空间，面对未来，机遇漫漫，信心满满。

Capgemini was founded in 1967 and is currently the largest consulting company in Europe. Capgemini ranks the top 5 provides of financial management consulting, technology and outsourcing solutions in the world. Its headquarter is in Paris and has over 340000 employees working in 50 countries. FSGBU is one of the largest business units in Capgemini Group, focusing on delivering solutions and services in banking, capital markets, insurance, payments & cards, risk management & compliance. Our clients are primarily Fortune 500 companies, including some of the largest commercial banks, insurers, diversified financial firms and asset finance companies.

Capgemini founded its China operations in 1996 to become one of the earliest foreign consulting companies in China. It established offices in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Kunshan, Shenyang, Hangzhou, Chengdu, Xian and Hongkong.
